description.desc1: The Transformation Node represents a transformation (position, rotation and scale) in 3D space. It can be connected to almost all nodes that have a representation in 3D space.
description.desc2: It can also be used to establish parent-child relationships in a hirarchical transformation structure, where child nodes are transformed relative to their parents

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
